items.sentence: I want to do everything I\'m supposed to do.
Maybe I can go to Boston with you next week.
Most of the men were wearing dinner jackets.
You shouldn\'t have gone to visit Tom alone.
You\'ll soon be able to sing as well as Tom.
Tom made it clear that I shouldn\'t be late.
You still haven\'t told me why you\'re here.
You thought I wouldn\'t notice, didn\'t you?
Mary applied moisturizing cream to her face.
Mary counted the remaining money in her bag.
Mary fell in love with a handsome young man.
Mary is just as beautiful as Alice, I think.
I should\'ve hit Tom while I had the chance.
I think Tom and Mary don\'t know each other.
I\'d like to spend more time with my family.
Tom was the first boy that ever kissed Mary.
I think we\'d better ask Tom what he thinks.
I think we\'re looking for different things.
I think we\'ve already wasted too much time.
I wonder if Tom will be in Boston next week.
